```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
nTip <- 6
trees <- as.phylo(seq_len(NUnrooted(nTip)), nTip)
nSampl <- 40L
tr1 <- sample(trees, nSampl, replace = TRUE)
tr2 <- sample(trees, nSampl, replace = TRUE)
dists <- mapply(ICQ, tr1, tr2)
dists[dists < sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)] <- 0
QD <- function (...) QuartetDivergence(QuartetStatus(...), similarity = TRUE)
qd <- mapply(QD, tr1, tr2)
plot (jitter(as.matrix(dists)) ~ jitter(qd))
```
